title._content: John H. Glenn Jr. being fitted with gloves for his space suit

description._content: Collection: NASA Human Spaceflight Collection Description: S62-00249 (1962) --- View of astronaut John H. Glenn Jr. being fitted with gloves for his space suit during pre-flight training activities at Cape Canaveral, Florida. Glenn is assisted by suit technician Joe Schmitt. image id: Photo-s62_00249 UID: SPD-SPFLT-Photo-s62_ 00249 Original url: spaceflight.nasa.gov/gallery/images/mercury/mercury6/html...
